1.0.3.name: wordpress/jabze-chat
1.0.3.description:
Jabze (http://www.jabze.com) is an industrial strength and IT friendly messenger service, with easy mobile access too. We have now extended its functionalities to the WordPress community, so that web masters can easily enable web site users to chat with each other on the site.

For Intranet Users

When your WordPress site is an intranet site serving a group of colleagues in an organization, Jabze Chat is an ideal service for everybody to keep in touch. The Jabze Chat window needs no installation for your users, and will pop up on the lower right corner on an as needed basis. All the colleagues will be there, there is no need to "add buddies" or otherwise manage your individual "buddy list".

For Web Site Operators

The Jabze Chat service is NOT designed for your web site visitors to contact your support team. Instead, it is designed to facilitate your content authors, reviewers, and managers to work to
